```{r}
rm(list = ls())

library(tstools)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
plot_varialbe <- read_excel("plot varialbe.xlsx")
```

```{r}
btyd= ts(plot_varialbe$btyd, start= c(1991,1), frequency = 1)

```


# Plots

Udvikling i kompensationsraten (ADAMs databank)

```{r}
plot(btyd,type="l",lty=1,lwd=1,xlab="Year",
ylab="Compensation rate",col="black",main="Compensation rate (1991-2020)",sub="Kilde:ADAM's databank"); grid()
```
